answerText: pair programming[10] The goal of pair programming is to reduce the number of these defects in a computer program. An off-by-one error is a common example of them.

subject: Science
question: Question: This technique may be used in extreme programming and agile programming. [10] Identify this methodology in software development in which one programmer types code and another person reviews the recently typed code for problems.
